aboutMeContent.intro: I'm an Industrial Administrator and, in recent years, I have expanded my horizons into the world of Software Engineering, aiming to solve problems and turn ideas into real solutions.
aboutMeContent.focus: I enjoy immersing myself in what I do, whether it's the flow of a production line or the algorithm behind a web system. For me, every challenge is an opportunity to learn, and every project is a way to demonstrate how dedication and knowledge can change lives.
aboutMeContent.learning: When I'm not developing technological solutions or optimizing processes, I'm probably learning something new, exploring ways to continuously improve, and helping others grow.

content.skillsContent: My specialty is Web Development and the ecosystem of technologies surrounding it. Below is a summary of my skills:
content.labsContent: In this section, you will find a selection of projects I have worked on over several months. Each one represents a unique challenge and an opportunity to apply and expand my skills. I am constantly exploring new ideas, so feel free to check back soon to discover more.
